mapper.sql: ID, DICT_TYPE_CODE, DICT_VALUE, DICT_NAME, PARENT_VALUE, PARENT_NAME, RANK, SORT_NO, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATEDBY, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DELETED, VERSION
mapper.select: select IDE.ID, IDE.DICT_TYPE_CODE, IDE.DICT_VALUE, IDE.DICT_NAME, IDE.PARENT_VALUE, IDE.PARENT_NAME, IDE.RANK, IDE.SORT_NO, IDE.VERSION, IDT.DICT_TYPE_NAME, IDT.PARENT_CODE from IPANTHER_DICT_ENTRY IDE join IPANTHER_DICT_TYPE IDT on IDT.DICT_TYPE_CODE = IDE.DICT_TYPE_CODE where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into IPANTHER_DICT_ENTRY (ID, DICT_TYPE_CODE, DICT_VALUE, DICT_NAME, PARENT_VALUE, PARENT_NAME, RANK, SORT_NO, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATEDBY, UPDATE_TIME, IS_DELETED, VERSION) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedby.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into IPANTHER_DICT_ENTRY
ID,
DICT_TYPE_CODE,
DICT_VALUE,
DICT_NAME,
PARENT_VALUE,
PARENT_NAME,
RANK,
SORT_NO,
CREATOR,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATEDBY,
UPDATE_TIME,
IS_DELETED,
VERSION,

#{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update IPANTHER_DICT_ENTRY
DICT_TYPE_CODE = #{dictTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DICT_VALUE = #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DICT_NAME = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_VALUE = #{parentValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_NAME = #{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RANK = #{rank,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SORT_NO = #{sortNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATOR = #{creator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATEDBY = #{updatedby.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
VERSION = VERSION +1,
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update IPANTHER_DICT_ENTRY set DICT_TYPE_CODE = #{dictTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DICT_VALUE = #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DICT_NAME = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_VALUE = #{parentValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_NAME = #{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RANK = #{rank,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SORT_NO = #{sortNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATOR = #{creator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATEDBY = #{updatedby.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select IDE.ID,IDE.DICT_TYPE_CODE, IDE.DICT_VALUE, IDE.DICT_NAME, IDE.PARENT_VALUE, IDE.SORT_NO, IDT.PARENT_CODE from IPANTHER_DICT_ENTRY IDE join IPANTHER_DICT_TYPE IDT on IDT.IS_DELETED = 'N' and IDT.DICT_TYPE_CODE = IDE.DICT_TYPE_CODE where IDE.IS_DELETED = 'N'
and IDE.DICT_NAME like '%${dictName}%'
and IDE.DICT_TYPE_CODE like '%${dictTypeCode}%'
